txt.en: Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
Rhûd-pulo-Drât is in need of a warrior to brave the depths of Nardol's ancient mine and destroy the source of the Dheghûn beneath the mountain.

You tell  Ghân-buri-Ghân your tale of the Gúthrakh, the ancient beast you defeated under the mountain.  Ghân-buri-Ghân lets out a mighty laugh that echoes across the valley.\n\n'I knew you friend to Drúedain. You more helpful to Drúedain than any outsider who ever visit these woods. This is a good day and a story no one Drúedain will forget.'
'Dheghûn come from darkness. They bring shadow to nature, slowly killing sacred forest. You must help, go in cave, stop Dheghûn. Dheghûn very very bad.'
Rhûd-pulo-Drât can be found in Nardol Quarry.\n\nYou should speak with Rhûd-pulo-Drât.
'You go in, I follow but need to think first.'
